email_text.subject: Manual Payment Notification
email_text.body:
A manual payment needs to be processed for the press {$contextName} and the user {$userFullName} (username "{$userName}").

The item being paid for is "{$itemName}".
The cost is {$itemCost} ({$itemCurrencyCode}).

This email was generated by the Open Monograph Press Manual Payment plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify a press manager contact that a manual payment was requested.
